connection_error.title: Failed to access internet
connection_error.message: An internet connection error occurred. Please try again later.

connection_timeout.title: Connection timed out.
connection_timeout.message: Please check your internet connection and try again.

receive_timeout.title: Failed to receive data.
receive_timeout.message: Please check your internet connection and try again.

send_timeout.title: Failed to send data
send_timeout.message: Please check your internet connection and try again.

unknown.title: An unexpected error occurred.
unknown.message: An error occurred on the apps. Please try again later.

400.title: Invalid request.
400.message: Please check the data you entered and try again.

401.title: You are not permitted.
401.message: Please check your credentials and try again.

403.title: Access denied.
403.message: You do not have permission to access this resource.

404.title: Resource not found.
404.message: Please check the URL and try again.

500.title: Server Error
500.message: An error occurred on the server. Please try again later.
